subject: Re: Website Next Steps | Privatus Capital Partners
preview: hey team closing this thread as its kinda long and big 🙏

full_threads.body: hey team closing this thread as its kinda long and big 🙏

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hey Guys,

Thanks for this awesome work - really appreciate the efforts over the past couple months.

I am just checking internally on if there is any feedback on the staging site changes, and once I have the green light I will let you know to push go on those changes live.

One thing I just wanted to check - we received a recent invoice (attached) and I just wanted to understand how that cost is built up? I have no doubt it is the correct number, but it would just be helpful to understand the detail to be able to explain to the rest of the team (i.e. how the quantity figures are calculated).

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

attachments.filename: Invoice INV-2863 - Wolf IQ Pty Ltd.html

full_threads.body: (Time: 5mins) - quick description update

Hi Finlay,

All updated—thanks for sending that through!

If there are any other tweaks you’d like, just let me know. Always happy to help.

Hi Adriane,

This is great.

Can we please change the text on the 2025 Automic deal to: "Advised Automic on the 100% sale to Advent International, valuing the company at A$725m."

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com
(Time: 15mins) updates that were addressed above the latest
(Time: 15mins) 2021 tombstone query fix + 2021 and 2025 background image generation and update

Hi Finlay,

Just a quick note to confirm that everything's now sorted:
  • The 2021 Automic tombstone was actually still there—there was just a query issue preventing it from displaying correctly
  • That’s now fixed, and both Automic deals (2021 and 2025) are using the background image you shared: green tech wave from iStock

Let me know if there’s anything else you'd like tweaked—happy to jump in.

Hi Adriane, Thanks for your time on the phone. As a reminder, here are the minor tweaks:
  • Add back in the 2021 Automic tombstone
  • Use this as the background for the two automic deals (2021, 2025)
    • https://www.istockphoto.com/vector/double-abstract-green-technology-wave-flow-of-particles-big-data-transfer-gm1667448660-535522648?searchscope=image%2Cfilm
Many thanks, Finlay Finlay Campbell Analyst M +61 416 718 923 E zara@privatuscp.com

Hey Finlay,

Just a quick heads-up—updates and additions have been made on the Privatuscp staging site:
  • You can check them out here: staging homepage
  • And also at the advisory page

I’ve also updated the Singapore footer location link—this change is visible on staging only for now.

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like tweaked—always happy to help!

Hi Finlay,

Got all the new and revised instructions—thanks for sending them through!

We’ll take care of these and keep you posted as we go.

Just let us know if anything else comes up in the meantime. Happy to help always.

Hi Adriane, Couple of extra changes to add to the list, apologies:
  • Can we make sure that the link embedded in the address for the Singapore location actually takes us to the Singapore offices. I think currently it takes us our old Australian offices.
    • This is where the link should take us: https://www.google.com/maps/place/88+Market+St,+Singapore+048948/@1.2842468,103.8317945,15z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x31da190c04dfcc63:0xa5198d4490bd7f0f!8m2!3d1.2842254!4d103.850227!16s%2Fg%2F11fmy0gn0p?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkxNS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
  • Can we change the year for the new Viridios AI deal to 2024, so it will fit between Aurrum Kids and Story House
  • Finally, can we actually make the VAI logo for the new tombstone the following:
Many thanks, Finlay Finlay Campbell Analyst M +61 416 718 923 E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Adriane, Please find below the details for the additional tombstone:
  • Viridios AI, 2025
    • "Advised Viridios Group on the sale of Viridios AI to Bloomberg."
    • Please use the VAI logo as found in the link below
      • https://tracxn.com/d/companies/viridios-technologies/__KYp3T9_cCh0a87aW_nBApOWTY4n0XsZ1PJkM0hPRZXM#about-the-company
    • Please use the image below as the background image
      • https://www.istockphoto.com/photo/aerial-view-on-green-pine-forest-gm1363689354-435153599?searchscope=image%2Cfilm
If possible, it would be great to see these changes by 4.30pm today as I am looking to sit down with the team by then to discuss. If this isn't possible, no stress! Many thanks, Finlay Finlay Campbell Analyst M +61 416 718 923 E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Finlay,

Got it—and thanks for sending this through!

We’ll go ahead and make the following updates:
  • Swap the positioning of the Aurrum Kids and Automic Group tombstones
  • Adjust background images to better reflect the original tombstone prominence
  • Change all logos to white
  • Increase the size of the Market Eye logo
  • Update the Automic tombstone text to:
    “Advised Automic on the 100% sale to Advent International, valuing the company at A$275m.”

We’ll hold off on the additional tombstone until you send those details through.

Thanks again!

Hi Adriane, Thanks for your time on the phone. For completeness, please find a list below of the minor tweaks to be made:
  • Swap the positioning of the Aurrum Kids and Automic Group transactions
  • Make sure the background images of the new tombstones reflect the prominence of the original tombstones
  • Change the logos to white
  • Increase the size of the Market Eye logo
  • Can you change the text on the new Automic tombstone to the following:
    • "Advised Automic on the 100% sale to Advent International, valuing the company at A$275m."
I will send through the details for the additional tombstone shortly. Many thanks, Finlay Finlay Campbell Analyst M +61 416 718 923 E zara@privatuscp.com

Hey Finlay,

Thanks again for your patience!

We’ve now added the advisory tombstones for:
  • Story House Early Learning, 2025
  • Automic, 2025

And we’ve also updated the existing tombstones for:
  • Automic, 2022
  • Automic, 2023
These are now ready for viewing on the staging site. Feel free to take a look when you have a moment.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to adjust, just give us a shout—always happy to help!
(Time: 10mins) - updating existing tombstones + added new tombstones for advisory

Hey Finlay,

Thanks for your note—and glad to hear it’s looking good so far!

We’ll let you know as soon as the changes to the tombstones are up on the staging site. We’re aiming to have everything in place by tomorrow morning.

Apologies for the delay, and if anything comes up in the meantime, feel free to reach out directly or give us a call via our Dialpad number: 0480 801 428.

Hope you have a great evening!

Hi Adriane,

That looks great - thanks.

Let me know when the other changes to the tombstones, and additional tombstones have been prosecuted on the staging site, and the team will review at that stage.

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com
(Time: 5mins) - initial adjustment of advisory carousel (forgot to record earlier - sorry)
(Time: 5mins)

Hi Finlay,

Thanks for your note!

I’ve gone ahead and adjusted the Advisory carousel as requested—it’s now sitting above the 'Advisory Services' section with the white background retained.

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like tweaked. Happy to help!

Hi Adriane,

Thanks for this and look forward to see the updated tombstones when they are ready for review.

In terms of the Advisory carousel, would you mind moving it above the 'Advisory Services' section, but keeping its background as white?

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst
